## Maximum Likelihood vs. Bayesian

ML / Frequentist:

- Parameters fixed, data varies
- $Pr[Data | \theta]$

Bayesian:

- Data fixed, parameters vary
- $Pr[\theta | Data]$

$$Pr[\theta | Data] = \frac{Pr[Data | \theta] \times Pr[\theta]}{Pr[Data]}$$
